unknown:
I didn't quite catch that, care to try again?
I couldn't quite parse that, sorry.
I don't know what you mean, sorry.
unignore: One, I'd like to interact with you!

commands.name: printAuthor
commands.description: I will reply with info about you.

commands.description: I will tell you how I'm feeling.

commands.help: I'm glad to be with you.

commands.help: You're so nice to be around.

commands.help: You're so nice to be around.

commands.name: ignoreAuthor
commands.description: I will stop interacting with you.

commands.name: setAuthorReact
commands.description: Change how/when I react to your messages.

commands.name: listCommands
commands.description: I will list available text-based commands.

commands.name: infoCommand
commands.description: I will tell you info about a specific text-based command.

commands.description: I will list available options for reacting to your messages.

commands.description: The chance that I will react to you.

commands.name: exceptionTest

commands.name: renderMonkeys
commands.help: Do a test render of this: https://only.one.com/one.png
commands.description: I will do a test render with that image.

commands.name: renderSnap
commands.help: Snap this out of existence: https://only.one.com/zero.png
commands.description: I will snap that image or video out of existence.
commands.extraHelp:
Optional parameters are:
Shape - Circle, Hexagon, Octagon, One, Tile, Triangle
Minimum distance (between each particle) - [1.0, 25.0]
Size (of each particle) - [0.1, 20.0]
Background color - hexadecimal color
Long example:
One, snap this rotated 3.14rad shaped like Hexagon with distance 4.0 and size 0.3 and background color #FF0000: https://only.one.com/zero.png

commands.name: calculate
commands.description: I will calculate your expression - please don't use punctuation!
commands.extraHelp:
Subtraction should have spaces around it! To write a negative number, make the - a part of the number (e.g. -2 and not - 2).
Supported operators are:
+ - * / ^ | || & && % mod log sin cos tan cotan
abs floor ceil fract ~ (boolean negation, aka not)
kg g t
m cm dm km mile ft yd in
rad deg
c f
s ms min h day month year decade century
l ml
b B kb kB kib kiB and other byte units, up to and including tera
untype
Unit unary operators will assign a kind of unit to your value, and attempt to convert to other kinds you specify.
If they're mismatched types, e.g. seconds (time) then celsius (heat), the type will simply be overridden preserving the value.
Knowing this, use 'untype' to directly change the type of convertible units without converting.

commands.name: updateCurrencies
commands.descriptiont: I will update my currency conversion rates if enough time has passed.
